annotations.description: The Nightcap cocktail isn't in the Kara Newman book we've been doing a series on, but I opted to put it in the same series because it is after all true to it...
annotations.title: Nightcap: Nightcap

textContent:
.75oz (22.5ml) Gin 
.75oz (22.5ml) Cognac
.75oz (22.5ml) Creme de Cacao
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice

Shake and double strain. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QmzqqrBYGVo
title: Nightcap
